title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
OB: If the key is left blank while adding, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
EB: In the properties file, the key should be left blank but still have a valid value. It should then be able to be externalized and displayed in the chart title.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Set externalized text in the chart title and leave the key blank. 2. Verify that the externalized text is still displayed in the chart title.
